articles.description: Pogba, 28, is out of contract in June and his Manchester United future has long been up in the air, with his personal trainer now confirming the Frenchman's desire to leave.
articles.content:
Paul Pogba's personal trainer has confirmed the midfielder will leave Manchester United this summer following the expiration of his contract. 
The Frenchman, 28, has been heavily linked with an exit… [+2853 chars]

articles.title: Liverpool star Sadio Mane admits footballers who live glamorous lives 'IRRITATE' him - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Senegalese forward, who's scored 12 Premier League goals this season, says he prefers to distance himself from a glamorous lifestyle and thanks his upbringing for his humble attitude.
articles.content:
Liverpool winger Sadio Mane has claimed that footballers who lives flashy lifestyles 'irritate' him.

articles.content:
